title: Hanging, 19th century
medium:
Medium: wool, silk
Technique: chain (with a hook), satin, seed and couching stitches on patchwork and applique of felted or fulled fabrics
description: Central field enclosed within a four-part border. Field is a black ogee lattice with a multicolored vine enclosing lobed red medallions with multicolor symmetrical floral pattern. Main border has a curving vine with large blossoms, leaves and birds in an Indian style on a greenish-tan background. Inner guard stripe, multicolored floral vine on a grey-green background. Outer guard stripe, stemmed triangles on a brown background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, 19th century. Medium: wool, silk
Technique: chain (with a hook), satin, seed and couching stitches on patchwork and applique of felted or fulled fabrics. 1973-12-1.
